sentences.english: Tea and coffee leave stains on cups and in pots.
sentences.chinese: 茶和咖啡会在杯和壶内留下污渍。

sentences.english: There is a mark of ink on his shirt !
sentences.chinese: 在他的衬衫上有一块钢笔水的污渍。

sentences.english: Wash with warm water, for other besmirch simply repeat the action.
sentences.chinese: 用温水冲刷，对其他污渍只需重复该动作。

sentences.english: This kind of laundry detergent can clean the most difficult smudges.
sentences.chinese: 再难洗的污渍都难不倒这种洗衣粉。

sentences.english: He made a huge blot on his copybook.
sentences.chinese: 他在练习册上弄了一个大的污渍。

sentences.english: And oxidation can turn an invisible stain into an unsightly yellow blotch.
sentences.chinese: 氧化可以使看不见的污渍变化成黄色脓斑。

sentences.english: Through the method of characteristics of besmirch flexibly.
sentences.chinese: 去渍方法应根据污渍特点灵活运用方法。

sentences.english: Soda acid liquid cannot be used when cleaning besmirch.
sentences.chinese: 清洗污渍时不可使用酸碱液体。

sentences.english: Sprinkle a thick layer of borax over the stain.
sentences.chinese: 向污渍上面洒一层厚厚的硼砂。

sentences.english: This detergent can remove stubborn stains.
sentences.chinese: 这种去污剂能去除难洗的污渍。

sentences.english: I couldn't remove the dirt from my shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我洗不掉衬衫上的污渍。

sentences.english: A thick coating stain sealer, and make it dry overnight.
sentences.chinese: 涂装一层厚的污渍封闭底漆，并使它隔夜晾干。

sentences.english: You have a smudge of chocolate on your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 你的衬衫上有一块巧克力的污渍。

sentences.english: Commercial stain removers are usually a good choice for more stubborn stains. Some choices include
sentences.chinese: 较顽固的污渍通常选择商用污渍去除剂是个好办法。

sentences.english: Commercial stain removers are usually a good choice for more stubborn stains. Some choices include
sentences.chinese: 较顽固的污渍通常选择商用污渍去除剂是个好办法。

sentences.english: This way, remove cosmetic besmirch is more ideal.
sentences.chinese: 这种办法去除化妆品污渍较理想。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
